mapper.insert:
insert into groupbuying values(groupbuying_seq.currval,${memberCode},1001,#{deadLine},0,${min},#{title},#{detail},#{productName},#{productPrice},2001,sysdate,null,null)
select groupbuying_seq.nextval from dual
mapper.select: select code from clientmember where id=#{loginId}
select code from businessmember where businessid=#{loginId}
mapper.update: update groupbuying set total = total + ${quantity} where code=${parentCode}
mapper.select: select count(*) from requestlist where parentcode=${code} and membercode=${memberCode}

select g.code, g.deadLine, g.statusCode, g.title, g.productName, g.productPrice, m.companyName, m.authGradeCode, i.code as imgcode, substr(i.path, instr(i.path,'\resources',1,1))||'\' as path, i.sysname from groupbuying g left join member m on g.memberCode = m.code left join groupbuyingimg i on g.code = i.postcode where i.code in ( select min(i.code) from groupbuyingimg i group by i.postcode ) order by g.deadline desc
select name, id as clientid, companyname, businessid from member where code = #{code}

select r.code as applyCode, r.membercode, r.quantity, r.regdate as applyDate, m.name, (select companyname from member where code in (select g.membercode from requestlist r left join member m on r.membercode = m.code left join groupbuying g on r.parentcode = g.code left join groupbuyingimg i on g.code = i.postcode where r.membercode = #{code})) as companyname, g.code as groupbuyingcode , g.membercode as businesscode, g.statuscode, s.value as statusvalue, g.deadline, g.title, g.productname, g.productprice, g.regdate, substr(i.path, instr(i.path,'\resources',1,1)) || '\' as path, i.sysname from requestlist r left join member m on r.membercode = m.code left join groupbuying g on r.parentcode = g.code left join groupbuyingimg i on g.code = i.postcode left join status s on g.statuscode = s.code where r.membercode = #{code} and i.code in ( select min(i.code) from groupbuyingimg i group by i.postcode )
and g.statuscode = ${statusCode}

select r.code as applycode, r.membercode, r.quantity, r.regdate as applydate, m.id as clientid , m.name, m.phone, m.email, m.zipcode, m.address1, m.address2, g.membercode as businessCode, g.productprice from requestlist r left join member m on r.membercode = m.code left join groupbuying g on r.parentcode = g.code where r.parentcode = #{groupbuyingCode}

select g.code, g.deadline, g.statuscode, g.title, g.productname, g.productprice, m.companyname, m.authGradeCode, i.code as imgcode, substr(i.path, instr(i.path,'\resources',1,1))||'\' as path, i.sysname from groupbuying g left join member m on g.membercode = m.code left join groupbuyingimg i on g.code = i.postcode where i.code in (select min(i.code) from groupbuyingimg i group by i.postcode)
and g.statuscode in (1002,1003) order by g.deadline desc
and g.statuscode = 1001 order by g.deadline desc

select g.code, g.deadline, g.statuscode, g.title, g.productname, g.productprice, m.companyname, m.authGradeCode, i.code as imgcode, substr(i.path, instr(i.path,'\resources',1,1))||'\' as path, i.sysname from groupbuying g left join member m on g.membercode = m.code left join groupbuyingimg i on g.code = i.postcode where i.code in (select min(i.code) from groupbuyingimg i group by i.postcode)
and g.productName like '%${keyword}%' order by g.deadline desc
and m.companyName like '%${keyword}%' order by g.deadline desc
